name: HarryPotterFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Harry Potter Facts”
”Alexa, ask Harry Potter Facts to give me some information about Harry Potter”
”Alexa, ask Harry Potter Facts to tell me a Harry Potter Fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: harry potter facts
des: Here are some amazing and interesting Harry Potter facts that you must know whether you are a Harry Potter fan or not. Some facts are so amazing that you will laugh like hell after reading them. And some will force you to think hundred times that could it be possible. Read these 26 interesting facts about Harry Potter here
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
